In a show of their newly friendly rapport , President Donald Trump gave North Korean leader Kim Jong Un a glimpse inside his presidential state car , [ARG1: a] $ 1.5 million [ARG1: Cadillac] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: known] [ARG2: as " The Beast] . " '
